paragraph.paragraph: The EiffelCOM Wizard allows the creation of Eiffel projects implementing or reusing COM components.

list.item:
10_how_wizard_works.xml How the EiffelCOM Wizard works
describes the steps followed by the wizard when creating the Eiffel project.

20_generated_files.xml Generated Files
describes the list of generated files and their usage.
30_class_hierarchy.xml Class Hierarchy describes the class hierarchy of the generated Eiffel project.

40_eiffel_project.xml Eiffel Project Processing
covers how to add a COM interface to an existing EiffelStudio project.
50_reusing.xml Accessing a COM Component describes how to reuse an existing COM component.
60_building.xml Building a COM Component describes how to build a new COM component.
70_options.xml Command Line Options describes using the wizard from the command line.
